text: I was told 30-45 minutes for delivery... an hour and 45 minutes later, and i still don't have my pizza! Terrible service! Finally got here at 6:35 (2 hours and 3 minutes later), and of course... it's like you would expect 2 hour old pizza to be...unbelievable! Never going here again...ever

name: Adam Solomon
text: Awesome pizza, I haven't even bothered with any other chain in years. They're customer service is great too. I had gotten delivery there recently and they brought me the wrong pizza. Delivery driver was back with the correct pizza in roughly 20 minutes. Love this place.

name: Krissie Hicks
text: Love this Hungry Howies! I used them for our Grad party and this place nailed it! They delivered at 3 separate times and each time the pizzas came hot, cooked perfectly and right on time! All if my guests were really impressed!  Thank you for making this an easy day for me!

text: I asked for tomato to be on side so it wouldnt be soggy when i arrived home an hour later. No tomato at all. Asked for no lettuce period and it was packed with lettuce. The workers were to busy being excited about leaving work in a few mins couldnt follow reciept order. Wont return.
